articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler wins his first Premier League Darts night with a 6-4 win over Nathan Aspinall in Belfast.
articles.title: Luke Littler beats Nathan Aspinall to win Premier League Darts night nine in Belfast

articles.description: Bringing Xabi Alonso to Bayern Munich this summer is "probably impossible", says the club's honorary president Uli Hoeness.
articles.title: Getting Alonso 'probably impossible' - Bayern chief

articles.description: Leicester City sack manager Willie Kirk, who had been suspended by the Women's Super League club.
articles.title: Leicester sack Kirk after relationship allegation

articles.description: The Football Association charges Newcastle United midfielder Sandro Tonali with misconduct in relation to alleged breaches of the governing body's betting rules.
articles.title: FA charges Tonali over alleged betting rules breaches

articles.description: Tatyana Heard and Megan Jones will form a new centre partnership for England in their Women's Six Nations game against Wales at Ashton Gate on Saturday.
articles.title: England make seven changes for Wales game

articles.description: Fourth seed Elena Rybakina moves into the Miami Open final for the second straight year with a dramatic win over Victoria Azarenka.
articles.title: Miami Open: Elena Rybakina beats Victoria Azarenka to reach final

articles.description: The Enhanced Games has been derided as "a clown show" and "borderline criminal". But their founder and his backers believe in a future few have foreseen.
articles.title: The mind behind the 'doped Olympics'

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Gladiators star Bionic to make predictions for this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Gladiators star Bionic

articles.description: Former Wales rugby star Louis Rees-Zammit is talking with Super Bowl champions the Kansas City Chiefs as he tries to find an NFL team willing to sign him for next season.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: What would signing for NFL team mean? Where could he go?

articles.description: Fourth seed Alexander Zverev ends the run of Fabian Marozsan to set up a Miami Open semi-final against Carlos Alcaraz or Grigor Dimitrov.
articles.title: Miami Open: Alexander Zverev beats Fabian Marozsan to reach semi-finals
